pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dataset for Statistical Analysis // Data are essential in statistical analysis. This data package consists of four datasets for descriptive statistics, two datasets for statistical hypothesis testing, and two datasets for regression analysis. All of the datasets are based on Rattanalertnusorn, A. (2024) https://www.researchgate.net/publication/371944275_po rkaermxarlaeakarprayuktchingan_R_and_its_applications.
